body.name: TRALT Office Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair, 330 LBS Home Mesh Office Desk Chairs with Wheels, Comfortable Gaming Chair, High Back Office Chair for Long Hours, Office Chair for Study and Work (Black)
features: Ergonomic Office Chair: Experience unparalleled support with our ergonomic office chair, designed to provide comprehensive assistance for your head, back, hips, and arms. Tailored lumbar support ensures your comfort and well-being. Suitable for people of about 5'5" to 6'2". Easily adjust seat height, headrest, backrest, and flip-up arms to cater to diverse needs, offering comfortable support during extended periods of sitting

Comfortable Breathable Mesh Seat: This office chair offers a spacious seating area, accommodating various body types. Overall dimensions (including arms): 25.7" W x 17.3" D x 46.9.3"-49.2" H, Seat dimensions: 20" W x 17.3" D x 18.5"-3" H. It can support up to 330 lbs. Its unique recline function allows you to tilt the backrest (90~120°) or sit upright freely, ensuring your comfort and relaxation

330 lbs Load Capacity and Durable Construction: This chair is made of high-quality materials and has a sturdy 5-point bottom metal base to ensure strength and stability. Whether you're working or playing, enjoy a chair designed to meet your needs

Convenient Mobility: The chair's 360° swivel base allows for effortless body rotation while seated. Its silent rolling wheels move smoothly in any direction, making it ideal for hard floors. Enjoy quiet and comfortable mobility in your office space. Can be used as student office chairs, computer chairs, ergonomic chairs, desk chairs, and gaming chairs; not only can sit comfortably, but also save money

Super Easy to Assemble: There is a clear assembly manual in the package, you can follow it step by step very easily. And no more extra tools are needed, all the screws and tools are already in the box. Mostly, it can be assembled within 15 minutes.【LIFETIME WARRANTY】This chair comes with a lifetime warranty. If you encounter any quality problems, please feel free to contact us. We will replace the necessary parts for you free of charge

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality，adjustable headrest
reviews.reviewText: Recently, I had the pleasure of transitioning to a new black ergonomic chair for my workspace, and it's been a game-changer. The chair's design, which prioritizes comfort and support, offers a seamless blend of style and functionality. It's not just about looking good; it's about feeling good throughout the workday.The assembly process was surprisingly straightforward. The manual provided is detailed and easy to understand, breaking down each step with precision. I appreciated how the smaller components like screws were organized by section, which significantly simplified the setup. However, a word to the wise: pay attention to the orientation of the seat cushion. I learned the hard way that it has a specific direction, but once I got that figured out, the rest was smooth sailing.Having used this chair for over a month now, its durability and quality are apparent. There have been no signs of wear or any functional issues, which is a testament to its build. It's an investment for anyone serious about their office environment and personal well-being.The chair's adjustable features, like the headrest, have been particularly beneficial for me as a taller individual. It's not often that you find a chair that caters to a wide range of body types with such ease. This adaptability is a standout feature and one that I believe many will find advantageous.In conclusion, while I refrain from using absolute terms, I confidently recommend this ergonomic chair. It's a reliable, comfortable, and aesthetically pleasing option for anyone looking to enhance their seating experience at work. Whether you're tall or just seeking a chair that meets the demands of prolonged use, this one deserves your consideration.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great looking/high quality, super comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I bought this high back chair to replace my old chair. The chair quality is awesome! It is quite simple to assemble as instruction is quite straightforward. I do like the white color as it brightens my office. Most highlighted part is it is super comfortable, well designed to support the back, especially the lower back. It is adjustable of the height. Really worth the price! Perfect looking/quality. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It took me 2 days to receive this chair. Because I didn’t have time to install it, I didn’t expect it to be so easy to install. It only took 10 minutes to complete it! It’s a pretty good product. The height can be adjusted, the back is designed to be breathable, and the wheels are very flexible. All in all, it’s very comfortable to sit on and work on!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, easy to Assemble, 2 missing screws for head piece
reviews.reviewText: The chair was easy to assemble, however it came with missing screws for the head rest so i had to go to the hardware store to purchase the screws missing. The chair is nice overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the second chair I had to have sent. The first one had incorrect screws or holes threaded to the bottom of the seat and couldn't connect the back rest to.The second one is falling apart where the backrest connects to the back of the seat. Not even a month after purchasing this chair the back rest has started to break the seat and is pulling out of the bottom. I only weigh 145 lbs. please avoid buying this chair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best office chair ever !
reviews.reviewText: This chair was so easy to assemble ! There are directions included, but there is also a very easy to follow video on their website. The chair is very comfortable, has great back support, can be easily raised and lowered.. There is a very nice head support, you can rock back , the arms raise a lower - really couldn't ask for more. We love this chair and it's very attractive in our home office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality, Comfortable, and Easy to Assemble
reviews.reviewText: This office chair is very comfortable and made of high-quality material. The instruction is clear, making it very easy to assemble. I particularly like the adjustable lumbar support design. The lumbar support has holes that make it breathable (which help stay cool during the hot summer).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This chair provides excellent support while studying or working on computer. The ergonomically designed backrest and cushioned seat offer good experience. It is comfortable, and the mesh makes it breathable. It is very sturdy and easy to assemble.
